screen_desc: The screenshot shows a search result page on Walmart's website. The search bar at the top is displaying the term "acer predator," and there's a search icon on the right. Below the search bar, there's a product listing for an Acer Chromebook 315, 15.6" HD, Intel Celeron N4000, 4GB LPDDR4, 128GB SSD, priced at $229.00. There are options for 2-day shipping or pickup, and a "Add" button is present to purchase the item. The page also includes options for sponsored items and shipping methods.
